languages.text: "Я уповаю, что милосердие будет целительным снадобьем, а не чашей яда, поднесенной пастве моей. Но слова твои я услышал и запомнил".
"I hope mercy will be a healing potion and not a cup of poison served to my flock. But I have heard your words and committed them to my memory."
languages.original_text: "Я уповаю, что милосердие будет целительным снадобьем, а не чашей яда, поднесенной пастве моей. Но слова твои я услышал и запомнил".

traits.locale_text: "I hope mercy will be a healing potion and not a cup of poison served to my flock. But I have heard your words and committed them to my memory."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "I hope mercy will be a healing potion and not a cup of poison served to my flock. But I have heard your words and committed them to my memory."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “我衷心希望仁慈能成为治愈病痛的良药，而不会成为毒害信徒的毒药。不过，我会将你的话牢记在心。”
languages.original_text: "I hope mercy will be a healing potion and not a cup of poison served to my flock. But I have heard your words and committed them to my memory."

traits.locale_text: “我衷心希望仁慈能成为治愈病痛的良药，而不会成为毒害信徒的毒药。不过，我会将你的话牢记在心。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「慈悲が癒しの薬となることを、信徒に与えられる毒にならないことを願います。ですがあなたの言葉を聞き、記憶に刻みました」
languages.original_text: "I hope mercy will be a healing potion and not a cup of poison served to my flock. But I have heard your words and committed them to my memory."

traits.locale_text: 「慈悲が癒しの薬となることを、信徒に与えられる毒にならないことを願います。ですがあなたの言葉を聞き、記憶に刻みました」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Espero que la misericordia sea una poción curativa y no una copa de veneno para mi rebaño. He oído sus palabras y las he grabado en mi mente».
languages.original_text: "I hope mercy will be a healing potion and not a cup of poison served to my flock. But I have heard your words and committed them to my memory."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que la misericordia sea una poción curativa y no una copa de veneno para mi rebaño. He oído sus palabras y las he grabado en mi mente».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, die Gnade besteht aus einem Heiltrank und nicht aus einem Kelch mit Gift für meine Gemeinde. Aber ich habe Eure Worte gehört und sie mir gemerkt."
languages.original_text: "I hope mercy will be a healing potion and not a cup of poison served to my flock. But I have heard your words and committed them to my memory."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, die Gnade besteht aus einem Heiltrank und nicht aus einem Kelch mit Gift für meine Gemeinde. Aber ich habe Eure Worte gehört und sie mir gemerkt."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Tant que la miséricorde est un élixir guérisseur pour mes fidèles et non une coupe de poison... Mais je me souviendrai de vos paroles. »
languages.original_text: "I hope mercy will be a healing potion and not a cup of poison served to my flock. But I have heard your words and committed them to my memory."

traits.locale_text: « Tant que la miséricorde est un élixir guérisseur pour mes fidèles et non une coupe de poison... Mais je me souviendrai de vos paroles. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Umarım merhamet, cemaatim için bir zehir değil de iyileştirici bir iksir görevi görür. Ancak sözlerini anladım ve aklıma yazdım."
languages.original_text: "I hope mercy will be a healing potion and not a cup of poison served to my flock. But I have heard your words and committed them to my memory."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım merhamet, cemaatim için iyileştirici bir iksir görevi görür, bir zehir değil. Ancak sözlerini anladım ve aklıma yazdım."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
